story_description: As a user I want to create a new task with priority and due date so I can track work.
acceptance_criteria: Form validates title, description, priority, due date
Task appears in dashboard with correct metadata
happy_path: See success toast and task card

unhappy_paths.title: Invalid due date
unhappy_paths.expected: Validation error explaining due date must be future

unhappy_paths.title: API failure
unhappy_paths.expected: Error banner, retry logged to telemetry

story_description: As an attendee I want to check in to the event so that staff can confirm my arrival.
acceptance_criteria: Check-in button visible to registered attendees

unhappy_paths.title: Duplicate check-in
unhappy_paths.expected: Error stating attendee already checked in

unhappy_paths.title: Offline mode
unhappy_paths.expected: Graceful offline message and queued retry
